Hero.description: Senior Engineer (7y+) helping organizations deploy reliable <highlight>agentic workflows</highlight>. From concept to production code.

About.intro: Don't hire a siloed AI researcher. Hire a builder who knows the database, the API, and the LLM.
About.bridgeDesc: I bridge the gap between reliable Legacy Engineering (PHP/Shopify) and Modern AI. I don't just write prompts; I build the pipelines that make AI safe for business.
About.stability: I bring backend stability to the chaos of generative AI. I ensure your AI features are secure, scalable, and maintainable.

Services.title: AI Solutions
Services.subtitle: For E-commerce
Services.description: I help webshop owners in Utrecht move from "manual work" to "autonomous growth" with these three core products.
Services.auditDesc: I analyze your current workflows and data to find high-ROI automation opportunities. You get a roadmap, not just code.
Services.mcpDesc: Secure data bridges matching the Model Context Protocol. Let your AI "see" your bespoke PHP/SQL data securely.
Services.agentDesc: Digital employees built in Python/LangGraph that handle returns, support tickets, and outreach while you sleep.

Experience.title: Professional
Experience.zoomflowDesc: Delivering scalable web applications for businesses. Specializing in modernized PHP stacks and AI integration. Building reliable systems that drive growth.
Experience.rentmanDesc: Led backend development and Scrum processes. Domain-Driven Design (DDD) implementation and legacy system improvements.
Experience.tikanicaDesc: High-performance specialized development. Managed Docker/Kubernetes infrastructure and complex Symfony applications.

CaseStudies.title: AI
CaseStudies.automatingReturnsDesc: Reduced customer service load by 60% by implementing a smart classification agent directly within a Laravel webshop.
CaseStudies.legacyMigrationDesc: Refactoring a 10-year old codebase to define clear context boundaries for future LLM integration.
CaseStudies.internalToolsDesc: Building a custom dashboard where Staff can delegate tasks to AI colleagues. Built with Next.js & Supabase.

Contact.description: Ready to modernize your infrastructure? Schedule a free 15-minute discovery call to discuss your architecture.

form.name: Name
form.successDesc: Thanks for reaching out. I'll get back to you within 24 hours.

AboutMe.title: Beyond the Code
AboutMe.intro: I'm Hugo, a French developer who moved to Utrecht 2 years ago. While I build AI systems for a living, I believe that even in an AI-driven world, human connection matters more than ever.
AboutMe.philosophy: That's why I prefer meeting in person whenever possible. Whether it's grabbing coffee in Utrecht or a video call, I think the best solutions come from real conversations, not just Slack messages.
AboutMe.fact1: Originally from France ðŸ‡«ðŸ‡·, now calling Utrecht home
AboutMe.fact2: Always up for a coffee chat about AI, PHP, or life in the Netherlands
AboutMe.fact3: Believer in human-first tech, even when building autonomous systems
